import React, { useState } from "react"; import GetAllDevicesIP from "./Tools/GetAllDevicesIP"; import GetAllSubnets from "./Tools/GetAllSubnets"; import "../styles/Tools.css"; export default function Tools(ac) { const handleIPs = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let row = []; ac.dc.clientList.map((item) => { var rowModel = [ { Description: item.name, Model: item.model, LAN_IP_address: item.lanIp, MAC_address: item.mac, WAN_1_IP: item.wan1Ip, WAN_2_IP: item.wan2Ip, Serial: item.serial, }, ]; row.push(...rowModel); ac.dc.setmapRows(row); }); }; const handleSubnets = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let row = []; ac.dc.vlanList.map((item) => { var rowModel = [ { Subnet: item.subnet, VlanID: item.id, VlanName: item.name, DNS: item.dnsNameservers, }, ]; row.push(...rowModel); ac.dc.setmapRows(row); console.log("handleSubnets -> row", row); }); }; return (

Organization ID

Description

This scripts iterates through all networks in an organization and returns all the IPs associated with every organization.

); }
